TC-001.Title: ProbableLineupFULL_001_Integration_PrematchView_TEST_Desktop
TC-001.Preconditions:
1. User is logged into the Betting Sisal platform.
2. Fantacalcio APIs are integrated and reachable.
3. At least one upcoming football match is available in the system.
TC-001.Dataset: Upcoming football match ID, valid user credentials, API response sample for ProbableLineupFULL.
TC-001.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only probable lineups rendering from Fantacalcio API.

Steps.Expected Result: The prematch view displays probable lineups for both teams, accurately reflecting the data from the Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API.
Steps.Step Description: Access the Betting Sisal platform on Desktop and navigate to the prematch view for an upcoming football match.
Steps.Step Expected Result: Prematch view is displayed for the selected match.

Steps.Expected Result: The prematch view displays probable lineups for both teams, accurately reflecting the data from the Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API.
Steps.Step Description: Verify that the probable lineups are displayed, sourced from the Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API.
Steps.Step Expected Result: Probable lineups for both teams are visible and match the data from the API.

Steps.Expected Result: Boundary 'lastUpdate' values are displayed in the correct format without errors.
Steps.Step Description: Identify matches with boundary date/time values in the 'lastUpdate' field (e.g., 01/01/1970 - 00:00, 31/12/2099 - 23:59).
Steps.Step Expected Result: Matches with boundary values are present in the list.

Steps.Expected Result: Boundary 'lastUpdate' values are displayed in the correct format without errors.
Steps.Step Description: Verify that the application displays these boundary values correctly in the GG/MM/AAAA - HH:MM format.
Steps.Step Expected Result: Boundary values are displayed correctly and do not cause display or formatting issues.
